column4: I am thinking about adding 1 gig ram stick to my ubuntu server.. I don't know if It can handle a DDR memory but I'll try. Will the server automaticly identify it like a desktop enviroment?
daedhel; I'm almost thro the installer.. 90% done, should I restart the installer and add the memory to avoid problems?
daedhel; I'm not sure if the DDR stick is supported (if the computer can handle it)
daedhel; I will install it and then try to add the memory stick and see what it says
daedhel; I see... how do I edit this?
